summary.span: 表示具有内容的弹出窗口。

span.span: Represents a pop-up window that has content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **内容模型**： 有一个内容属性： 。**Content Model**: has one content property: . 最多只能有一个子级，可以是任意子级 。A can have a maximum of one child, which can be any . 下图显示了 一个具有作为父控件的控件 。The following illustration shows a control that has a as its parent. ![Popup 图](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup 图")![Popup illustration](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup illustration") 可以通过设置 、 、、 和 属性来定位 popup。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). 当 屏幕上显示时，如果重新定位其父项，则不会重新定位。When is displayed on the screen, it does not reposition itself if its parent is repositioned. 在 屏幕上其自己的窗口中显示其内容。A displays its content in its own window on the screen. 当 属性设置为 `true` 且应用程序以完全信任模式运行时，控件支持动画。A control supports animation when the property is set to `true` and the application is running with full trust. 以完全信任级别运行的应用程序具有对系统资源的完全访问权限，并且通常安装在用户的系统上。An application that is running with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the user's system. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Security (WPF) ](/dotnet/framework/wpf/security-wpf)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/security-wpf). 若要在的内容上显示位图和不透明度效果 ，必须直接对内容设置效果 。For bitmap and opacity effects to appear on the content of a , you must set the effects directly on the content. 的内容 不会继承在控件上设置的 或父窗口中任何其他元素上设置的效果。The content of a does not inherit effects that are set on the control or on any other element that is in the parent window. 默认情况下，会将设置为其内容大小。A is sized to its content by default. 出现这种情况时，应用 或位图效果可能会导致 被遮住。When this occurs, applying a or bitmap effects may cause the to be obscured. 出现这种情况的原因是，内容的默认大小没有为要显示的效果提供足够的区域。This occurs because the default size of the content does not provide enough area for the effects to display. 如果需要更多的空间，则可以定义内容周围的边距 以增加控件的可用区域。If more space is required, you can define a margin around the content to increase the area that is available to the control. 当在中使用时，必须在上设置属性 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)] 。The property must be set on the when used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]. 若要创建工具提示，请使用 和 类。To create a tooltip, use the and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ToolTip 概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview)。For more information, see [ToolTip Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 控件。The following example shows how to create a control. [!code-xaml[PopupSimple#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-csharp[PopupSimple#CreatePopup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#createpopup)] [!code-vb[PopupSimple#CreatePopup](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#createpopup)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowsTransparency { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowsTransparency : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示 控件是否可以包含透明的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control can contain transparent content.

value.span: 如果 控件可以包含透明内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can contain transparent content; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序以完全信任级别运行时，控件只能包含透明内容。A control can only contain transparent content when the application runs with full trust. 以完全信任级别运行的应用程序具有对系统资源的完全访问权限，并且通常安装在本地系统上。An application that runs with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the local system. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Security (WPF) ](/dotnet/framework/wpf/security-wpf)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/security-wpf). `true`如果 承载于中，则不能将此属性设置为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)] 。This property cannot be set to `true` when the is hosted in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]. 如果在 `true` 不在完全信任环境中运行的应用程序中将属性设置为，则 属性值将更改为 `false` 。If the property is set to `true` in an application that does not run in full trust, the property value is changed to `false`. 在浏览器中承载的应用程序是不以完全信任模式运行的应用程序的一个示例。An application that is hosted in a browser is an example of an application that does not run in full trust. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在控件上设置属性 。The following example shows how to set the property on a control. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#allowstransparency)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#allowstransparency)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#allowstransparency)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the control.

value.span: 控件的 内容。

span.span: The content of the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks **内容模型**： 属性是控件的唯一内容属性 。**Content Model**: The property is the only content property for the control. 只能有一个 作为子级，但该子元素可以包含复杂的嵌入内容。A can only have one as a child, but that child can contain complex embedded content. 例如，子元素可以是 包含 、文本和其他类型的控件的。For example, the child can be a that contains an , text, and other types of controls. 向控件添加内容时 ， 控件将成为内容的逻辑父级。When content is added to a control, the control becomes the logical parent to the content. 同样， 内容被视为的逻辑子级 。Similarly, the content is considered to be the logical child of the . 子内容不会添加到包含控件的可视化树中 。The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the control. 相反，当设置为时，子内容将呈现在单独的窗口中，并具有其自己的可视化树 `true` 。Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window with its own visual tree when the is set to `true`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将内容添加到 控件。The following example shows how to add content to a control. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#child)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#child)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#child)]

span.span: Attaches a child element to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可能需要创建一个自定义控件，该控件具有与现有控件相同的功能，并且还展示的行为 。You might want to create a custom control that has the same functionality as an existing control and also exhibits the behavior of a . 可以 通过将添加 到控件并调用方法来使控件的行为类似于 。You can make your control behave like a by adding a to your control and calling the method. 此方法将分配 `child` 给子属性，并将以下属性绑定到 `child` 。This method assigns `child` to the child property and binds the following properties to `child`. - - - - - - - - 你应在控件中将它们作为依赖项属性实现，以便可以使用与相同的方式 。You should implement these as dependency properties in your control so it can be used the same way as a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义依赖属性](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties)。For more information, see [Custom Dependency Properties](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties). 当你调用时 ， `child` 不能是的子级 。When you call , `child` cannot be a child of a . 此外，在 `PlacementTarget` 调用此方法之前，应在控件上设置。Also, `PlacementTarget` should be set on your control before you call this method.

summary.span: 获取或设置目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的水平距离。

span.span: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的水平距离。

span.span: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 有关目标原点和 popup 对齐点的信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior).

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 、 、、 和 属性来定位 popup。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 值的字符串表示形式 。A string representation of a value. 这会被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量值。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不必显式包含小数点。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. 例如，的值 `1` 是可接受的。For example, a value of `1` is acceptable. 相同 范围限制适用于本主题的属性值部分中提到的限制。The same range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic. `qualifiedDouble` `double`此表前面所述的值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 或 `pt` 。A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = 96px`in` is inches; 1in=96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将 和 属性设置为20。The following example creates a and sets the and properties to 20. 此 属性设置为 默认) (，因此目标原点是目标区域的左下角，popup 对齐点是的左上角 。The property is set to (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the . [!code-xaml[PopupPositionSnippet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向控件添加内容时 ， 控件将成为内容的逻辑父级。When you add content to a control, the control becomes the logical parent to the content. 同样， 内容被视为的逻辑子级 。Similarly, the content is considered to be the logical child of the . 子内容不会添加到包含控件的可视化树中 。The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the control. 相反，当属性设置为时，子内容在具有其自己的可视化树的单独窗口中呈现 `true` 。Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window that has its own visual tree when the property is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode Placement { System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件打开时的控件方向，并指定 控件在与屏幕边界重叠时的控件行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation of the control when the control opens, and specifies the behavior of the control when it overlaps screen boundaries.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定 控件打开时的控件方向，并指定该控件与屏幕边界交互的方式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the orientation of the control when the control opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 、 、、 和 属性来定位 popup。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). 如果 属性为，则将 `true` 设置为 或反转的位置; 如果设置为，则将设置为，并将 其左边缘与的右边缘对齐 ，并 将设置为使 其右边缘与的左边缘对齐 。If the property is `true`, setting to or reverses the position of the ; a with set to aligns its left edge with the right edge of and a with set to aligns its right edge with the left edge of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建了四个 相对于图像的控件。The following example creates four controls that are relative to an image. 对于 "位置" 属性，每个值都有不同的值。Each has a different value for the placement property. [!code-xaml[PopupPositionSnippet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为时，才能进行动画处理 `true` 。A can only animate when the property is set to `true`. 这需要创建控件的应用程序 以完全信任的方式运行。This requires the application that creates the control to run with full trust. 如果 已进行动画处理，则 将不会对进行动画处理。If the is animated, the will not be animated. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StaysOpen { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.StaysOpen : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 控件焦点不再对准时，是否关闭该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control closes when the control is no longer in focus.

value.span: 如果在 属性设置为 时关闭 控件，则为 ；如果在 控件外发生鼠标或键盘事件时关闭 控件，则为 。

span.span: if the control closes when property is set to ; if the control closes when a mouse or keyboard event occurs outside the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，将 一直保持打开状态，直到通过将属性设置 为来将其显式关闭 `false` 。When the property is set to `true`, stays open until it is explicitly closed by setting the property to `false`. 当 为时 `false` ， 控件截获所有鼠标和键盘事件以确定这些事件中的一个发生在 控件之外。When is `false`, the control intercepts all mouse and keyboard events to determine when one of these events occurs outside the control. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#staysopen)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#staysopen)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#staysopen)]

summary.span: 获取或设置目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

span.span: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 有关目标原点和 popup 对齐点的信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior).

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 、 、、 和 属性来定位 popup。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 值的字符串表示形式 。A string representation of a value. 这会被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量值。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不必显式包含小数点。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. 例如，的值 `1` 是可接受的。For example, a value of `1` is acceptable. 相同 范围限制适用于本主题的属性值部分中提到的限制。The same range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic. `qualifiedDouble` `double`此表前面所述的值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 或 `pt` 。A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = 96px`in` is inches; 1in=96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将 和 属性设置为20。The following example creates a and sets the and properties to 20. 此 属性设置为 默认) (，因此目标原点是目标区域的左下角，popup 对齐点是的左上角的位置 。The property is set to (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area, and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the . [!code-xaml[PopupPositionSnippet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#5)]
